Title: Establishes the homeless protection act which designates certain offenses against homeless persons as hate crimes
Summary: Establishes the homeless protection act which designates certain offenses against homeless persons as hate crimes; includes the definition of homelessness.
LawCode: Amd §485.05, Pen L; amd §837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the executive law, in relation to designating offenses against homeless persons as hate crimes
